Get Involved

Volunteer in your own community

  1. Determine the number of Night Night Packages to complete
  2. Order tote bags from Project Night Night
  3. Fill each tote bag with a new blanket, a new/new like stuffed animal and a new/like-new children's book.
  4. Deliver your assembled Night Night Package to a shelter on our list or that you find.
  5. Ensure that the homeless children in your community feel special!
Start Now

Donate

Monetary Gifts

Project Night Night relies on the generous donations of individuals and companies to fund this charitable program. Project Night Night is a tax-exempt 501(c)(3) not-for-profit corporation. All donations to Project Night Night are tax deductible to the extent of the law.

Learn More

Tribute Gifts to Celebrate Special Occasions

Your gift will pay tribute to someone special while helping Project Night Night touch the lives of homeless children. We will send a card of recognition to the honoree.

Please include the name and address where it sys "Enter Honoree Name." If it does not appear, please email us the information at Kendra@ProjectNightNight.org

Learn More

Sponsor a Night Night Package ($25)

You donation of $25 will help to underwrite the cost of a Night Night Package. For each donation of $25, a Night Night Package will be delivered to a homeless child in your honor. Each gift allows Project Night Night to reach out and to serve one more homeless child.

Learn More

Product Donations

Project Night Night spends thousands of dollar and many hours each year disposing of donations that do not meet our guidelines. Please only donate great quality items which the homeless children we help will be proud to own.

Learn More

Kids Fundraising & Philanthrophy Zone

As a kid, you're always looking for new ways to be awesome. At Project Night Night, we want to give you the tools to do just that and in the process, you will help other kids who could use someone awesome by their side.

With our Be Awesome Program, we'll help you raise money and make a real difference by doing lots of things you already do: using your computer to create cool invitations, talking to your friends and family about things that interest you, and throwing fun parties. The Be Awesome Program is about using all that's good in you to help out someone else.

Every $20 you raise lets us put a Night Night Package into the arms of homeless child. With that money, we will send a tote bag filled with an awesome blanket, book, and stuffed animal to a child living in a shelter.

Learn More

Birthday Heroes and Other Special Occasions

We know that it is your special day, and Project Night Night appreciates your sharing it with us by collecting donations of money or product on our behalf.

  1. Monetary Gifts

    2. In lieu of a few gifts, encourage guests to donate to Project Night Night. Tell us where the birthday hero lives, and we will place a special birthday card in the mail.

  2. Assemble Night Night Packages

    3. Turn your party into a world of fun by having a hands-on volunteer event as part of your special day. For complete instructions visit our Adopt a Night Night Package Program page.

  3. Collect Product on our Behalf

    4. Invite partygoers to bring a new item to donate. Project Night Night welcomes new blankets, books, and stuffed animals for children ages zero to 12. Collected items may be dropped off or mailed directly to Project Night Night.

  4. Printable

    5. We are proud to be a part of your big day. As our gift to you, please help yourself to our free printables to bring a complete Project Night

Learn More

Corporate Programs

America's best companies participate in Project Night Night's corporate community service program.

Project Night Night wants your company to have the best hands-on volunteer experience. We offer "turn key" service projects. We provide all products, services, and directions. In exchange, we request a donation from your company to help us continue to improve the lives of homeless children. We can work with you to produce programs ranging in size from 25 Night Night Packages to 2,500.

Start Now

Cause Marketing

Thank you for your support of the Project Night Night. Our organization strives to find mutually beneficial cause-related marketing relationships in support of our mission. We enthusiastically welcome the opportunity to explore and develop new corporate champions. Our organization looks for companies with a solid history and strong brand image who would like to make a contribution that is significant and clearly defined to the consumer.

Our corporate champions provide Project Night Night with an opportunity to reach out to a variety of audiences with information about our mission and to raise funds to support the services we provide to the homeless community. In addition, cause marketing initiatives provide corporate supporters an opportunity to make a positive impact in the community and to involve employees and consumers in the cause.

We believe that small actions can make a difference in the lives of children.

Learn how you can get involve today.

Start Now
